/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, filled with cars and buses, is flanked by buildings on both sides, creating a corridor of concrete and glass. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and vehicles.
